content.p: The Biodiscovery Institute is a world-leading hub of interdisciplinary research excellence that is shaping the future of health and biotechnology. The Â£100 million Biodiscovery Institute is home to nearly 850 talented academics, researchers, clinicians and other support staff who share a common passion: to use, or support, scientific endeavour to deliver change for the greater good. We are the Biodiscovery Institute. Discover more about the Biodiscovery Institute Find out more about our areas of research Find out why research culture important part to us Taking our research to the public World-class facilities at the Biodiscovery Institute Find out more about the BDI Brochure 2023 View our publications View our Good News Hub Follow us on Twitter We've created a suite of buildings to house around 850 staff and PhD students dedicated to biodiscovery.
